title: Swiss Chard Chicken Strip Salad
description: A healthy and delicious salad combining the earthy flavors of Swiss chard with the protein-packed goodness of chicken strips.

items: 2 cups of fresh Swiss chard leaves, chopped
1 cup of grilled or baked chicken strips
1/4 cup of red onion, thinly sliced
2 tablespoons of crumbled feta cheese or goat cheese (optional)
2 tablespoons of roasted sunflower seeds or slivered almonds

instructions: Wash and dry the Swiss chard leaves and mixed greens thoroughly.
Chop the Swiss chard into bite-sized pieces and place them in a large salad bowl.
Add the mixed greens (optional) to the bowl.
Top the greens with grilled or baked chicken strips.
Add cherry tomatoes, red onion, cucumber, shredded carrots, cheese (if using), and sunflower seeds or almonds to the bowl.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, Dijon mustard, honey, salt, and pepper to make the dressing.
Drizzle the dressing over the salad and toss gently to combine.
notes: Feel free to substitute chicken with grilled tofu or chickpeas for a vegetarian option.
You can also customize the toppings with your favorite nuts, seeds, or dried fruits.
